A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I actually signed up on Rotten Tomatoes to give this movie a review. This is the worst movie I've ever seen. Worse than \"The Room\". Yeah\, that bad. I grew up on SW. I love the saga but this is terrible. It's offensive to fans and viewers. A clear sign that Disney doesn't have a handle on anything in the SW universe and that they're finding directors like Rian and Jar Jar Abrams to write fan fiction movies.
